item.title: LaraMod - Modularised Laravel 5.5
item.description: Laravel is an amazing emerging, well-designed and well-developed PHP framework. It is currently under active development and has been among top Web development frameworks. The latest version of Laravel, 5.5.x, imposes a conventional project structure that is well documented here. For a simple development project, the structure is totally fine. Nevertheless, unless some necesssary configurations you might not want to mix up your development codes and resources with Laravel’s. And you might also want to organise your project into submodules that are assigned to more than one team/person such that they can be developed silmutaneously. Thus, the need for complex submodule organisation is quite obvious.
